name: Badb's Tea House
description:
Squeeeeeeeeaaaaalllll! It's Badb. She's so awesome and she has just opened up a tea house to the east of Pipsville. Everyone wants to drink her mushroom tea and eat her strawberries and cream! But not everyone is happy that Badb has setup shop again, for in strange ways she has accidentally upset a denizen of the underworld.

Maybe you could check in and make sure nothing gets out of hand? Ta'ra, thanks for the help!

Controls (Story mode): Use a mouse to click dialogue, characters and pan around the world.

================================

Badb's Tea House is a short and light 2d, side scrolling, point and click adventure game. It was made with the Fungus SDK and Unity3d.

Badb's Tea House is the sequel to: Grandpa Pip's Birthday
